name: SQARE
description:
I introduce the game called sqare 

hmmm why is it called sqare and not square i really don't know why

Sqare is a Platformer game made by only ONE GUY   ......I mean by me 

what do you get by playing this game?

I am glad you asked it  gives you 

  • fun  (maybe ?)
  • flex how smart you are  in the  game 
  • gives you a spicy RAGE  or just  a BABY RAGE 
  • every level is a mystery 
  • maybe addictive?
  • there are three levels (easy, medium,  still working on hard)
  • and if you don't finish the game I don't know  what to call you  probably a (UNGAMER )
  • and when you finish the game you can call yourself a GAMER.
  • simple (maybe)
<<update 1.1 !>>
  • fixed the resolution size  for web 
  • and made it web only 
  • changed the start and the restart 
  • add  a new colour
  • made it more responsive
